alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FURNAS COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Norton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beaver City around 225 PM CDT. Hollinger around 230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Edison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
